Name: Carmen Del Socorro
description:
Carmen is a hard-working microentrepreneur who is 55 years old and single. She has dedicated herself to her used clothing business for 16 years, and it has gone very well for her because she has been able to improve it little by little.

She is requesting loan number 18 to invest in buying blouses, pants and t-shirts. With the profits she earned thanks to the previous loan, she was able to buy a television and a mattress. One of her goals is to keep her business growing successfully.
